person.persName: R G Anderson (Monroe County farmer and stock raiser)

body.p: Born on August 21, 1821 in Monroe County. Farmer and stock raiser. Married to Angelina McCrowder, children included Sallie, Jane, and John. Second wife Julia Boyd, children included Juila, Mary, William, James and Susan D. Third wife Sarah Randolph, children included Maggie, Franklin, Robert, George, and Maggie. Lived in Clinton County, Missouri from 1851-1877.
